Html:
Hi,

  I am using HTML Agility Pack 1.4.6 in my program. It is a Small Program. I am getting a HTML Tag Value from Web Page.So I am using HTML Agility Pack. It is very useful to me. It is a Lightweight Tool for reading HTML Tag. Could you please tell me How can i get mail Id from web Page using  HTML Agility Pack? Sometimes it doesn't read Title Tag also.

For Eg:

<Title>

Lakshmi Narayanan -Software Engineer

</Title>

So How can i read those values?

Thanks and Regards,

Lakshmi Narayanan.S
